definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Je 50:23 forge-hammer;—(NH = BH; Aram. loan-word acc. to Frä:85, and so Ar. fit.=iysun (cf. Ar. trad. in Lane), v. Targum [[פַּטִּישָׁא]]; but Lag:BN 103 cp. fit.=iysah;un swine's snout, Syr. pt.a4 flat-nosed);—´[[פ]] abs. Is 41:7, Je 23:29; cstr. Je 50:23 fig. of Bab. as destroyer.
